titleStmt.title: A panegyrick to His Renowed [sic] Majestie, Charles the Second, King of Great Britaine, &c.
titleStmt.author: Flatman, Thomas, 1637-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Marsh at the Princes Arms in Chancery-lane near Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T.F. (i.e. Thomas Flatman).
Verse - "Return, return, strange Prodigie of Fate!".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Princes Arms in Chancery-lane near Fleetstreet
